title: Behind the Scenes Minis: M & M
itunes:title: Behind the Scenes Minis: M & M
description:
Tracy and Holly discuss online disagreements over the origin of the science-fiction genre of literature and the nature of Margaret Cavendish’s marriage. They then talk about Mabel Lee’s willingness to advocate for other people, and how much of her quoted words are from when she was a teenager.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
